name: Reset Custom Post
author: MELIOZ.dev

sections.description:
üßπ After testing and adding test content to your site, do you want to clean it up quickly and efficiently before going into production? The Reset Custom Post plugin is the solution! Unlike other plugins that delete all the content on your site, my plugin lets you select precisely what you want to clean up while preserving important pages or other content.

üí° With Reset Custom Post, you can easily select the type of content you want to clean up, and even delete associated images with a single click. What’s more, I’ve added a new feature that lets you remove items from the taxonomies available for the selected custom content type. üóëÔ∏è The cleanup process is transparent and tracked via a detailed log window, guaranteeing an optimal user experience.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the reset-custom-post folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the Reset CPT menu in the WordPress admin dashboard Tools to access the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Q: Will this plugin delete all my site’s content?
A: No, this plugin only targets specific custom post types that you select. It won’t delete other content such as pages, posts, or media files.

Q: Is it reversible?
A: No, the deletion process is irreversible. Please ensure you have backed up your data before using this plugin.

short_description: Reset Custom Post is a WordPress plugin that provides an easy solution for managing unwanted custom post content.
